Server Python Code
===================

The server code is in python making use of the django framework. There are
application modules to handle the details of the HTTP requests, and project
modules to handle the django settings.

Application modules
-------------------
.. automodule:: app.models
   :members:
.. automodule:: app.admin
   :members:
.. automodule:: app.forms
   :members:
.. automodule:: app.views
   :members:
.. automodule:: app.urls
   :members:
.. automodule:: app.tests
   :members:

Project modules
---------------
.. automodule:: proj.settings
   :members:
.. automodule:: proj.wsgi
   :members:
